content: By: Martina Mercer March 21, 2016 10 Simple Steps for Creating a Blog Your Readers Will Adore Content Marketing | Blogging | SEO Copywriting The keys to making your blog a success is knowing who'll be reading it and what they desire in the way of content. Read this post By: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré March 15, 2016 Here’s How to Combine Storytelling and Data to Produce Persuasive Content Content Marketing | Blogging | SEO Copywriting Ever thought about what really sticks out in your audience's minds? Hint: it's not the hard facts alone. Combining data and storytelling can make your brand's content stick out in a meaningful way; Nichole DeMeré shows you how in today's post. Read this post By: Sam Anthony March 1, 2016 Here’s How a Brand New Website Built an Email List of More than 1,300 Contacts in Three Days Blogging | Email Marketing | Social Media Today I'm going to share how the website FunThingsToDo.io generated 22,000+ pageviews from one blog post. The unbelievable part is the post has zero backlinks and the domain name is only 3.5 months old... Check out the top posts of the year, which comments resonated with the community, who the top commenters were, and more. Here's to a great 2016! Is it on your own site, or on third-party platforms like Medium and LinkedIn? Rand goes over the boons and pitfalls of using hosted blog platforms in this week's Whiteboard Friday. Read this post By: Eric Enge October 19, 2015 Preparing Your Killer Content Marketing Pitch Content Marketing | Marketing Industry | Blogging The hardest part of writing any pitch isn't the creation of the pitch itself. It's the legwork you have to do in advance. Successful pitches are all about preparation, and frankly, there needs to be a lot of it. By following these essential 6 steps to crafting and delivering your pitch, you'll be sure to amplify your content marketing efforts. Read this post By: Sayed Shahnur October 16, 2015 Craft Winning CTAs with Four Simple Tips Content Marketing | Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) | Blogging Even if you're a novice at crafting CTAs, you have the ability to create messages that attain clicks. Here's what they had to say. Content Marketing | On-page SEO | Blogging The author's small test seems to confirm Google's affinity for fresh content. You might consider a similar experiment for your site.
